name: Forgotten Spelunker
description:
Forgotten Spelunker is a 2D platformer all about getting as far down as possible!

Features:

  • Herringbone procedural generation!
  • Sweet pixel art!
  • Traps n junk that kill you!
  • Juicy 8-bit sounds, and spooky cave music!


Controls:

  • A and D to move
  • W or SPACE to jump
  • S to crouch

Tools Used:

  • Unity (Game Engine)
  • Aseprite, Gimp (Images)
  • sfxr (Sound Effects)
  • Ableton (Music)

Credits:

  • Charlie Merrihew: Level Design and Sound
  • Miles Wood: Programming + design
  • Alex Undy: Art and little bit of everything else

All of the art assets (including the font and music!) were created during the 72 hours of the Ludum Dare 48 game jam!
